This task tracks the implementation of the source IR consumer in Arrow C++.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14077?focusedCommentId=17565735) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14077?focusedCommentId=17607889) by @toddfarmer:*
The Compute IR component has been abandoned in favor of Substrait. Please see [here](https://lists.apache.org/thread/o9vf5fzkkpjzxqsw2bd5b6grh9ov8ys2) for details on engaging with the Substrait project.
